Summary: Star like object moved across sky then rapidly flew up out of sight
divs: sighting detailson wednesday evening 2\17\2010 between 6:30 and 7:00, my gf called me to go outside while she smoked. since i have seen something strange in the summer of 2009 (two objects traveled across the entire sky at extremely high altitude one in front of the other and then both returned across the same track) i always scan the sky whenever i take the dogs out or go outside during the evening. i was only outside for about 30 seconds when i pointed out a bright star like object moving in the sky. i quickly drew her attention to it since it obviously was not a jet. (i am prior usaf) i asked her what she thought it was and it then quickly gained altitude and shrank in size and brightness and then disapeared from view. the total viewing time was very short at about 1 minute or so.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around February 17th 2010
